title: Prickly Pear Margarita recipe composition
statement: Prickly Pear Margarita is made with Casamigos Reposado Tequila, lime agave sour and prickly pear purée with a Grand Marnier float.

citations.quote: Casamigos Reposado Tequila, lime agave sour and prickly pear purée; float of Grand Marnier
